author: HeinerTholen
body:
The update of BTagCalibrationReader contains two new methods for users: `min_max_pt` and `eval_auto_bounds`. The interface and src files are still left in CondFormats/BTauObjects. The reason is that I found it a bit unnecessary to create a complete new library for just one class. Also, there would be a need for separate classes_def.xml and classes.h files, since we would like to have the BTagCalibrationReader accessible from python.

Furthermore, all files in RecoBTag/PerformanceDB that are connected to BTagCalibration (new format) are moved into CondTools/BTau, which is a new Package. It seems to me that everything that is left in RecoBTag/PerformanceDB belongs to the old b tag scale factor format, but I can't say for sure.
title: Update of BTagCalibrationReader and code move to CondTools/BTau
